title: Hearty Minestrone Soup
ingredients: ['1L (1 3/4 pints) vegetable stock', '2 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 large potato, cubed', '1 onion, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 large head cabbage, finely chopped', 'handful chopped parsley', 'handful chopped basil', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '1 (500g) bag frozen sweetcorn', '1 large courgette, sliced', '1/2 (500g) packet stellette soup pasta', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
